com.salimov.yurii.config

Class ContentConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.config.ContentConfig

  • @Configuration
 @PropertySource(value="classpath:content.properties")
public class ContentConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    The class describes a Content configurations.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yuriy Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    ContentProperties
